name: Warhorse
description: A powerful and trained mount, larger than ordinary horses with thick hides and a fierce temperament. Often outfitted with barding.
memorable: Known for charging fearlessly into combat and trampling foes.
goals: Used as mounts by knights, cavalry units, and adventurers.
relations: Commonly associated with cavalry and battlefield units.
environment: Often found in battlefields and stables.
strengths: Possesses high strength for physical confrontations.
weaknesses: Low intelligence and charisma, limiting mental and social capabilities.
attacks: Hooves attack that deals bludgeoning damage; can knock enemies prone.
most_powerful_ability: Trampling Charge ability that can knock targets prone if condition met.
senses: Passive perception of 11, allowing it to notice things in its environment.
additional_information: Can be used effectively in combat.
Has a fierce and loyal temperament.
Trained to remain calm in chaotic situations.
test_queries: fast combat horse with bludgeoning attack
